Sentencas: Performance of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is significantly affected by ohmic and concentration losses.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: The ohmic losses increase with reduction in macroscopic and microscopic contact area at the interfaces of different components.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: On the other hand, the concentration losses depend on the distribution of fuel and oxidant over the active area.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: Present work aims to investigate the performance improvement through design modifications obtained from root cause analysis.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: The influence of the interfacial resistance (ohmic), both, in terms of the external compression load, i.e., the interaction at the microscopic level and macroscopic contact area, is minimised.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: The effect of the uniformity of the flow distribution on the performance of the scaled up SOFC is analysed.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: To these objectives, the base configuration is modified and the influence of the different modifications on the electrochemical performance is studied.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: At 0.7 V, the performance is observed to be enhanced by 62% through minimization of the contact resistance between interconnect and electrode.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: It is further improved by 100% with an increase in the apparent contact area for a given cell.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: Additional 50% enhancement in performance is observed by achieving better uniformity in the flow distribution.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis

Sentencas: Overall similar to 212% enhancement in the performance is achieved with a design, which consists of all the modifications in one cell.
Titulo: Improvement in solid oxide fuel cell performance through design modifications: An approach based on root cause analysis
